DeviceMotionEventRotationRate.summary: A DeviceMotionEventRotationRate interface of the {{domxref("Device Orientation Events", "", "", "nocode")}} provides information about the rate at which the device is rotating around all three axes.

DeviceMotionEventRotationRateAlpha.summary: The alpha read-only property of the interface indicates the rate of rotation around the Z axis, in degrees per second.
DeviceMotionEventRotationRateAlpha.value:
A double indicating the rate of rotation around the Z axis, in degrees per second.
See Orientation and motion data explained for details.

DeviceMotionEventRotationRateBeta.summary: The beta read-only property of the interface indicates the rate of rotation around the X axis, in degrees per second.
DeviceMotionEventRotationRateBeta.value:
A double indicating the rate of rotation around the X axis, in degrees per second.
See Orientation and motion data explained for details.

DeviceMotionEventRotationRateGamma.summary: The gamma read-only property of the interface indicates the rate of rotation around the Y axis, in degrees per second.
DeviceMotionEventRotationRateGamma.value:
A double indicating the rate of rotation around the Y axis, in degrees per second.
See Orientation and motion data explained for details.
